column1: Ent-draughts were the mysterious and potent waters consumed by the Ents which Treebeard shared with the hobbits in the Wellinghall.
Though little is known about them in detail
column2: they seem to have been made from river-water
column3: but with unique and subtle flavours reflecting the Ents association with trees and forests.  The first time Meriadoc Brandybuck and Peregrin Took imbibed an ent-draught it reminded them of the smell of a distant wood brought from afar by a cool night breeze.  The second time they drank the flavour was earthier and richer

column1: Their power of growth was most evident when they were drunk by beings other than Ents: the Ent-draughts taken by Merry and Pippin added three inches or more to their heights
column2: making them the tallest Hobbits in the history of the Shire.
